Address.value: 1066 WEST HASTINGS STREET,SUITE 1750, VANCOUVER, British Columbia, V6E 3X1, Canada

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Silvercorp Metals Inc is a mineral mining company. It acquires, explores, develops, and mines precious and base metal mineral properties at its producing mines and exploration and development projects in China. The group produces silver, gold, lead, and zinc.
